tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: She is slow moving between points. Will stand in silence without a problem, which makes the class unbearably slow. The book Is awesome. Outline the problems in the book, it\'s not worth writing out the (optional) answers. Read the case, take the rule, move on. A final, can submit problem answers to her for feedback.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Contracts & ILS ? so I spent about 6 hours a week w/ her, ugh. Never called on me once. By the end of the semester she called on the same 5 people. I felt unprepared going into Contracts II. She talks about her personal life way too much. Stay away if you can. My ILS TA Susan was really helpful though. I had Hatcher for K2 who was the best.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: A decent teacher. She likes to explain things to death, but that can be good. Her grading is very fair/Borderline generous. Only con is that going to her office hours is a waste of time. Her idea of helpful feedback is telling you that you need to do better. She won\'t tell you anything more specific than that. She\'s a nice lady though.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Prof. Korzec cares a lot about professionalism and civility between students. If you are respectful to her she is respectful to you. The text book she used was awesome!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Professor Korzec is very intelligent, but she shares very few of her knowledge with her Contracts students. Less than half of each class was about the material, the rest was devoted to unrelated tangents. I learned the entire semester from the book. Sympathetic towards students but still condescending and rude on a regular basis.
